home.description: I am a Frontend Developer with experience in JavaScript and React with a passion for creating innovative and easy-to-use applications that improve the user experience.

about.title: About Me.
about.presentation: Hello! My name is Alexander and I am from Venezuela. I am 20 years old and I am a frontend developer with a great passion for programming. I love learning new things every day and I enjoy creating projects that allow me to use my skills to do something meaningful.
about.currently: Currently, I am studying Computer Science and constantly taking courses at Platzi to improve my skills in JavaScript, React and other web technologies. I look for opportunities to continue learning and growing in the field of web development.
about.technologies: Technologies I've been working on recently

contact.title: Get in touch.
contact.opportunities: I am always open to new opportunities that allow me to grow professionally and contribute my knowledge to interesting projects. If you're looking for a skilled and passionate developer to work on your next project, don't hesitate to get in touch.
